<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Crossbow Terror](/Feats.aspx?ID=6254) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 185 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=238)

**Prerequisites**
[Archer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6252)

</column>

---

Your skill with a crossbow strikes terror into your opponents when you threaten them with the next bolt. Interact to reload a crossbow and then attempt an Intimidation check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395). You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to this check if you succeeded at a Strike with a crossbow this turn.
name: Crossbow Terror
